name: react-flop-card
description: Card component with flip animation implement in React Motion

scripts.start: NODE_PATH=src budo src/index.js:dist/bundle.js --dir src/demos --dir . --host localhost --live -- --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.test: NODE_PATH=src mochify --recursive test --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.cover: NODE_PATH=src mochify --recursive test --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --plugin [ mochify-istanbul --report text ]

author: Khoi Pham <pckhoi@gmail.com>
